original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE v.UserId = u.Id AND c.UserId = u.Id AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND c.Score=2 AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount<=9 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-20 18:17:25' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-26 12:57:22' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-02 07:58:47' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.BountyAmount>=0 AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-05-19 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.UpVotes<=230 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-09-22 01:07:10' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-15 05:52:23' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 2

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) <= 9 AND (CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 18:17:25' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-26 12:57:22')
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-02 07:58:47'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E3.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.UpVotes <= 230 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-09-22 01:07:10' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-15 05:52:23')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2E3.OwnerUserId=E5.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.BountyAmount >= 0 AND votes.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-05-19 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E5E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3E5.OwnerUserId=E4.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E5E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E5E4 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E3E5E4.OwnerUserId)
